name: Nanami to Issho ni Gakubo! English Joutatsu no Kotsu
name_original: Nanami to Issho ni Gakubo! English Joutatsu no Kotsu
description:
Nanami to Issho ni Gakubo! English Joutatsu no Kotsu is an educational game developed by Media5. It was originally released in 2013. media5 published the game.
Nanami to Issho ni Gakubo! English Joutatsu no Kotsu is available on Nintendo 3DS.
